content:
```
EXISTING STRUCTURES

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when using extracting but not having the item or being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
 -  Make sure that the entity you are trying to extract from contains the item you are trying to extract

### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Check the target inventory size before inserting items

### Errors when accessing inventory contents
- Chest objects do not have a 'contents' attribute. Use the game API to query the contents of a chest.

### Errors when harvesting with a full inventory
- Check the inventory size before harvesting items

NAMESPACE
```
